# Learning Objectives
By the end of the week, learners will be able to: 

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
* Get connected to all the class materials & tools
  * Write custom functions in R
  * Conduct a simulation experiment
  * Construct a CI for a population parameter from a simulation experiment
